name: lemonade
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 80 HP.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A very sweet drink that restores HP by 80 points.
flavor_text.emerald: A very sweet drink that restores HP by 80 points.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A very sweet drink. It restores the HP of one POKéMON by 80 points.
